name: babel-plugin-comment-strova-assert
description: Replace commented expressions with assert statements

scripts.example01: touch example/* && npm run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=default node -r babel-register example/example01.js
scripts.example02: touch example/* && npm --resetCache run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=default node -r babel-register example/example02.js
scripts.example02:throw: touch ./example/* && npm run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=throw node -r babel-register example/example02.js
scripts.test: touch example/* && npm run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=default mocha  'src' --compilers js:babel-register --recursive
scripts.test:console: npm run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=default mocha '**/*.console.spec.js' --compilers js:babel-register --recursive
scripts.test:throw: touch example/* && npm run fake-install && BABEL_ENV=throw mocha '**/*.throw.spec.js' --compilers js:babel-register --recursive -name '*.throw.spec.js'
